word[0]: would you be kind enough to do something/be so kind as to do something
definition[0]: used to make a polite request
example[0]: Would you be kind enough to close the door, please?
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say please could you ...? or would you mind ...? because the expressions with kind can sound too formal and unfriendly:
example[1]: Would you mind closing the door?
